interface.help: Other RSS fields. All values are in text format.
interface.name: rssFields
interface.label: RSS fields

messages.content: You are a AI Tools expert. Summarize this article{{1.source.url}} in a way that makes it easy to create social media posts from the output. Be sure to include the URLs for the actual tools mentioned when relevant and not the article you are summarizing.

You're a social media expert and your job is to write a engaging tweet for X from the following article summary:  {{2.choices[].message.content}}. You do not have to summarize the entire article in the tweet. You can choose one tool or interesting point to highlight in the tweet. Your audience is entrepreneurs who are interested in AI tools. Be sure to use appropriate hashtags. Do not exceed 280 characters in the post. Be sure to Include a link to the tool in the Tweet. Write in a way that makes it seem like you are sharing a thought rather than making it sound overly promotional.

expect.name: for_super_followers_only
expect.label: Allow to Post Exclusively for Super Followers Only

messages.content: You're a social media expert and your job is to write a engaging post for Instagram from the following article summary:  {{2.choices[].message.content}}. You do not have to summarize the entire article in the post. You can choose one tool or interesting point to highlight in the post. Your audience is entrepreneurs who are interested in AI tools. Be sure to use appropriate hashtags and emojis. Do not exceed 500 characters in the post.

mapper.prompt: Create an appropriate image for this instagram post: {{5.choices[].message.content}}Do not include any text at all in the image under any circumstances - zero exceptions. Image Requirements- Maximum file size: 8MiB- Aspect ratio: Must be within a 4:5 to 1.91:1 range- Minimum width: 320 (will be scaled up to the minimum if necessary)- Maximum width: 1440 (will be scaled down to the maximum if necessary)- Height: Varies, depending on width and aspect ratio- Formats: JPEG

You do not have to summarize the entire article in the post. You can choose one tool or interesting point to highlight in the post. Your audience is entrepreneurs who are interested in AI tools. Be sure to use appropriate hashtags and emojis. Do not exceed 500 characters in the post. Be sure to Include a link to the tool in the Post.
